outline:
1. to turn aside
    1. (Qal) to turn aside, turn (in order to cover)
  2. to envelop oneself
    1. (Qal) to envelop oneself, cover
  3. to be feeble, be faint, grow weak
    1. (Qal) to be feeble, be faint
    2. (Niphal) to faint
    3. (Hiphil) to show feebleness
    4. (Hithpael) to faint, faint away
kjv_def: cover (over), fail, faint, feebler, hide self, be overwhelmed, swoon.
strongs_def: to shroud, i.e. clothe (whether transitive or reflex.); hence (from the idea of darkness) to languish
